rmi.graph

Class RMIGraphNodeImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • rmi.graph.RMIGraphNodeImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, RMIGraphNode

    public class RMIGraphNodeImpl
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements RMIGraphNode
    An implementation of the RMIGraphNode interface. Has a list of neighbors, a trace of the propogation and a name to make it easier to understand.
    Author:
    cachera brabant
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      private java.lang.String trace

    • Constructor Detail

      • RMIGraphNodeImpl

        public RMIGraphNodeImpl(java.lang.String name,
                java.util.List<RMIGraphNode> neighbors)
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Initialize a RMIGraphNodeImpl with his neighbors. RMIGraphNodeImpl can be set to null.
        Parameters:
        name - A name to make the trace easier to understand
        neighbors - The neighbors of the RMIGraphNodeImpl. If it's null, the RMIGraphNode doesn't have neighbors.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

        public java.lang.String propagate(byte[] data,
                         java.util.List<RMIGraphNode> path)
                           throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: RMIGraphNode
        Give data as an array of byte to the RMITreeNode in order to propagate to the leaves of the tree.
        Specified by:
        propagate in interface RMIGraphNode
        Parameters:

      • sendDataToNeighbors

        public java.lang.String sendDataToNeighbors(byte[] data,
                                   java.util.List<RMIGraphNode> path)
                                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: RMIGraphNode
        Send data as an array of byte to every children of the RMITreeNode. If the node hasn't any neighbors or if every neighbors are in path, put the message in the trace.
        Specified by:
        sendDataToNeighbors in interface RMIGraphNode
        Parameters:
        data - An array of byte containing the data to send to the children.
        Returns:
        The trace of the children receiving the data.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
